comments.title: With Tide, it’s a new life !
comments.description: Stumbled upon this range from Tide recently and I am truly satisfied. When it comes to whites, I have always been very particular about the cleanliness and crispness of clothes- be it my tops or kids uniform. Tide ultra not only retains the colour by beating stains at difficult spots like cuffs and underarms but also gives a fresh crispy texture to the clothes. It’s like , my clothes get a new life everytime I wash with Tide ultra. Price vise also it’s a great buy!
